## Question 4
**If statements: section 4.1.2, exercises 5**

```{r}
mortgage<-function(n,P,open){
  if(open==TRUE){
    return((0.005*P)/(1-((1.005)^(-n))))
  }
  else{
    return((0.004*P)/(1-((1.004)^(-n))))
  }
}
```
